content: stardew valley chicken crochet large supplies 6mm hook eyes 12mm honestly could go larger for more anime look tapestry needle locking stitch markers bernat blanket yarn body magic loop 7sc in loop mark beginning of round with locking stitch marker round 2 increase in every stitch round 3 *single_crochet increase* round 4 *2sc increase* round 5 *3sc increase* round 6 *4sc increase* if you want chicken to be even larger continue pattern of increases 5sc increase etc round 7 *in back loop only single_crochet* optional but gives additional shape/definition to the chicken base round 8 *single_crochet* repeat for 9 additional rounds add more rounds for an even larger chicken cut yarn leave a tail to stitch chicken together by using a darning needle going through one loop on one side and then one loop from another side sew up about halfway and fill with polyfil and place eyes two row down and three to four stitches apart this is not for children under 3 years of age because of the safety eyes if you don t want to do safety eyes you can use yarn and embroider two vertical stitches instead embroider beak between eyes two horizontal stripes tie off on the inside finish stitching back seam up pull tightly so both ends tilt up hide yarn tail in the body comb in contrasting color insert hook in head wherever you deem the best placement is and ch1 3 double_crochet in first stitch white of head 2 or 3 double_crochet in second stitch chain 1 slip_stitch into chicken to attach back of comb to chicken make a knot and hide the tails if you enjoyed this pattern and you feel so inclined donate to my ko-fi https //ko-fi com/meghansolo57611 it is 100000% not required but very much appreciated
